title: Enhance trading strategy with hybrid MACD/RSI/ATR indicators
description: Refactor trading logic with new parameters: MACD (12/26/9), RSI (14, 70/30), ATR (14), SMA 50, SMA 200. Entry: Price > SMA 200, EMA 12 crosses above EMA 26, RSI < 70, SMA 50 trending up. Exit: Trailing stop-loss (2*ATR), Take-profit (1.5:1 or 2:1 RR). Files: BackEnd/modules/strategy.py
